title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change immediately in the user interface.
OB: The height of the label remains unchanged even after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The height of the label should adjust automatically to reflect the new font size.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the UI. 2. Locate the label. 3. Modify the font size of the label. 4. Observe that the height of the label does not change.
